Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.repeaters

Class BaseRepeater

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
All Implemented Interfaces:
Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject, Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseCollectionChangeWatcher, BaseComponent, BaseConverter, BaseExtractor, BaseReadableResource, Batcher, BatcherTest, ConnectionListener, DeploymentSet, EmailSender, FieldArchive, FileCache, Folder, JarLauncher, KivaKitThread, KryoSerializationSession, MessageChecker, Project, Retry, Settings, StateMachine, VirtualReferenceTracker
public class BaseRepeater extends Multicaster implements Repeater
A multicasting repeater which repeats all the messages it receives to a set of listeners. A base repeater is a convenient way of implementing the Repeater interface by extension.

If a class is already extending some other base class a stateful RepeaterMixin can be used: 

 public class A extends B implements RepeaterTrait
 {
 }
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
Listener, Multicaster, Repeater, RepeaterMixin, Mixin
